bookfere/Ebook-Translator-Calibre-Plugin

translate ebooks in Calibre with multiple engines

View on index

Related repos

  • Automates book downloads for Calibre-Web libraries
  • automates Calibre-Web with extra ebook management features
  • Web app for browsing, reading, and managing eBooks with your Calibre library
  • Converts ebooks to audiobooks with chapters, metadata, multilingual TTS, voice cloning
  • Terminal ebook reader with text-to-speech and multi-format support
  • bilingual web translator extension and userscript
  • Web app for correcting OCR data and creating ebook-style PDFs
  • browser extension for translating pages, subtitles, messages, with offline mode, custom translators, personal dictionary, open-source and privacy-focused
  • turn books into audiobooks with one command
